#Apple employees literally walking into walls at spaceship campus. That's funny.  http://trde.it/2FlN18B $AAPL

links.title: Apple employees at $5B glass spaceship campus are walking into walls
links.description: CUPERTINO, Calif. -- Apple's stunning "spaceship" campus -- official name: Apple Park -- is giving some staff a headache and worse. Apple's giant, doughnut-shape headquarters building is wrapped in glass and there's plenty more glass inside too, walling-off offices and meeting rooms -- and workers literally have been walking into walls, CBS San Francisco reports.

messages.body: Apple: Don't Underestimate This 'Small' Business $AAPL http://www.seekingalpha.com/article/4152968

links.title: Apple: Don't Underestimate This 'Small' Business
links.description: Nearly six months ago, I argued that "not much attention had been spent on the possible product refresh announcement of the third-generation Apple ( AAPL) Watch". In my view, this fly-under-the-radar product category had the ability to generate $11.8 billion in annual revenues by 2021, based on my conservative estimates.
